txt.en: 'I have only begun looking through the notes I recovered, but there is promise in this discovery. I could not have succeeded without your involvement, [placeholder]. Thank you.'
A Worthy Distraction
Return to the foot of hidden path beneath the Ordâkhai encampment
Wait for Nangar to enter the camp

'I trust you enough, [placeholder], that I am willing to enlist your assistance in a matter requiring direct conflict against the fortress to the north-west.

'I need a distraction... one loud enough and long enough to provide me cover to sneak into the encampment and out again unseen.

'If you are willing, I know of a secret path into the encampment. Meet me at the top of the path beneath the Ordâkhai structure on the plateau. You will find it north of Jirush.'
Nangar told you to attack the Ordâkhai to distract their forces
'I will meet you near the secret path at the south-west foot of the plateau beneath the Ordâkhai encampment.'
Ordâkhai dôla slain ([placeholder]/2)

'Sneak into the base and defeat the dôla — the captains — the lieutenants, and the other soldiers within. While you create the commotion, I will steal behind the walls and try to find plans drafted by the keep lord Jombahok.'
Ordâkhai jackal-keepers defeated ([placeholder]/4)
Nangar enlisted you to aid in a distraction while he steals information from the Ordâkhai encampment overlooking Jirush.
Ordâkhai warriors defeated ([placeholder]/14)
Nangar directed you to meet him beneath the Ordâkhai camp on the plateau by following a hidden path at south-western edge of the plateau. You will help provide a distraction for him.
Nangar stole into the encampment and vanished from sight. You are to assault the Ordâkhai encampment providing him a distraction long enough to go about finding their plans.
Speak with Nangar at the foot of the hidden path
Nangar signaled you when you arrived beneath the Ordâkhai encampment. You should speak with him.
Defeat Ordâkhai dôla ([placeholder]/2)
'Move quickly. Do not let them see your descent. Come and visit me near my residence, and we shall discuss our next moves.'
Defeat Ordâkhai jackal-keepers ([placeholder]/4)

You fought back the Ordâkhai and, hopefully, provided Nangar enough time and distraction to acquire the plans. Return to the hidden path at the south-western foot of the plateau beneath the Ordâkhai encampment to speak with him.
Defeat other Ordâkhai warriors at the encampment north of Jirush ([placeholder]/14)
Go to the location Nangar described beneath the Ordâkhai encampment
'Sneak into the base and defeat captains, lieutenants, and the other soldiers within.'
'While you create the commotion, I will steal behind the walls and try to find plans drafted by the keep lord Jombahok.'
Nangar waits for you along the hidden path beneath the Ordâkhai encampment. Speak with him to learn how successful you both were in your actions.
After speaking with Nangar near the Ordâkhai encampment, he asked to speak with you more openly at this home in the relative safety of Jirush.
You return to the foot of the hidden path and spy Nangar
You arrived at the location and Nangar signaled you

'We should move quickly. You provided me enough time to acquire a selection of notes, and I hope the plans I sought. Thank you, [placeholder]. Return to me at my home in Jirush where we can speak in relative safety.'
